constantValues: Liability associated with the loan application.

members.description: Unique identifier for entity instances.

members.name: name
members.description: The name of the liability listed on the application.

constantValues: The name of the liability listed on the application.

members.name: accountNumber
members.description: Account number for the liability held in financial institution.

constantValues: Account number for the liability held in financial institution.

members.name: balance
members.description: The amount of outstanding balance owed on this liability.

constantValues: The amount of outstanding balance owed on this liability.

members.name: balance_Base
members.description: Value of the Balance in base currency.

constantValues: Value of the Balance in base currency.

members.name: Bank
members.description: The bank to which a particular liability is owed.

members.name: city
members.description: The city where this liability is located.

members.name: countryRegion
members.description: The country or region where this liability is located.

constantValues: The country or region where this liability is located.

members.name: description
members.description: Description of the liability.

members.name: isPayOffPending
members.description: When true, indicates that the liability will be paid off at or before closing.

constantValues: When true, indicates that the liability will be paid off at or before closing.

members.description: The type of the liability.

members.name: monthlyPaymentAmount
members.description: The dollar amount of the monthly payment required on this particular liability.

members.description: The amount of the monthly payment required on this application liability, in base currency.

members.description: The number of remaining months owed to satisfy this liability.

members.name: balancedisplayvalue
members.description: Display value shows the balance of the liability as a positive value. That is, a liability with an accounting value of -500 will appear as 500.
